mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(a.cnslt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cnslt_dt, a.cnslt_no AS cnslt_no, c.cust_nm AS cust_nm, a.cnslt_cn AS cnslt_cn, e.emp_nm AS emp_nm FROM kcgbd.e_cnsltlist AS a JOIN kcgbd.e_customer c ON a.cust_no = c.cust_sn JOIN kcgbd.e_employee e ON e.emp_no = c.emp_no ORDER BY a.cnslt_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kcgbd.e_cnsltlist(cust_no, cnslt_cn, cnslt_dt, emp_no) VALUES ( #{cust_sn}, #{cnslt_cn}, now(), #{emp_no} )
